meanings.sent1: The reoccurrence of the same mistake frustrated him.
meanings.sent2: The reoccurrence of her favorite TV show brought her joy.
meanings.sent3: The reoccurrence of his silly dance moves always made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The reoccurrence of sunny days lifted her spirits.
meanings.sent5: The reoccurrence of his contagious laughter filled the room with joy.

meanings.sent1: The reoccurrence of the melody in the song was catchy.
